mapper.insert: insert into db_spzx.sys_menu() values (#{id}, #{parentId}, #{title}, #{component}, #{sortValue}, #{status}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.update:
update db_spzx.sys_menu
title = #{title},
component = #{component},
sort_value = #{sortValue},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id}
